item.title: Gridlock – Formless
item.description: A complex album with intelligent and distorted beat rhythms, soundscapes and shoegaze atmospheric melodies

item.title: Diaphane – Samdhya
item.description: Piano based melodies and progressive clear beat rhythms with Ab Ovo's trademark.

item.title: Tzolk'in ‎– Tzolk'in
item.description: Dark ritual and tribal power electronics with a mayan heritage.

item.title: ArD2 ‎– Night Lights EP
item.description: Analog techno and electro through Gerald Donald’s legacy with cold sounds, yet filled with melodic atmospheric layers and chords.

item.title: Haujobb ‎– Solutions For A Small Planet
item.description: Power electronics, complex idm rhythms and ambient moments. Haujobb's abstract lyrics derive from the new technologies, the net and the resulting social relationships.

item.title: Sons Of Melancholia ‎– Beauty Is Imperfection
item.description: Sequences, pads and abstract techno bleeps with lots of delays. A tensed and blue feel throughout its content.

item.title: Night is our time - mixtape
item.description: A mixtape, for our 1st year's anniversary.

item.title: Ricardo Donoso – As Iron Sharpens Iron, One Verse Sharpens Another
item.description: Donoso’s synthetic and down-techno music delivers a scenery constructed steadily with sequences dark and tensed.

item.title: Bogmon – A Scream in the Void
item.description: Dark with complex and strong rhythms that constitute the solid structure of each track. Sounds and bass layers come and go, decorating masterfully the downtempo and technoish feel of most tracks.

item.title: Lofeye ‎– The Road is a River
item.description: “The Road is a River” is an experimental world themed album by Lofeye. It is filled with samples from folk riffs and voices with a techno(ish) beat and feel.

item.title: Flaque ‎– Mindscapes
item.description: Flaque makes his distinction by building beautiful soundscapes, delayed and airy sequenced melodies, and by manipulating kattoo-styled beats and rythms

item.title: Loess - Burrows
item.description: Ambient and downtempo with dystopian sequences, broken melodies and glitch hip hop beats, could vaguely describe what should be expected from this release.

item.title: r.roo - mgnovenie
item.description: Neo-classical and minimal–ambient with rhythm beats from classic idm-style to techno and dubstie

item.title: Undermathic - Return to Childhood
item.description: Melodic, rhythmic – sampled, industrial/idm with a taste of post-rock and sequenced ambience

item.title: Scanone - Scenes
item.description: Scenes” is like a collection with the most distinctive tracks of a full length album. Electro – glitch is Scanone’s main approach, but idm-focused and dub(ier) tracks come along.

item.title: Senking - Pong
item.description: Dark and ambient deep bass on a slow dupstep mode. Keys in chords on a downtempo mood.

item.title: Subheim - Approach
item.description: Experimental beats with cinematic and downtempo feel. Dark and deeply melodic sounds with female vocals.

item.title: Hecq - 0000
item.description: Ambient – modern classical, abstract – idm and industrial focused on micro-manipulated mechanics and steady yet complex rhythm

item.title: Plaid - Scintilli
item.description: "Scintilli" can be described as IDM. Also a little techno, but we will go for plain experimental electronica. It is experimental not on the mechanics though, but on melodies and keys.

item.title: Kattoo - Megrim
item.description: Beats, break beats and mechanic hip hop rhythms with dark and cinematic symphonic compositions.

item.title: Von Magnet - De L'Aimant
item.description: Electroflamenco. Ritual, industrial, theatrical songs and compositions.

item.title: Metropolis - Guardian Of The Heartmachine EP + 214 - Drift Diving EP
item.description: Two electro- techno EPs that will satisfy the paranoiawkward dark listener/dancer.

item.title: Mlada Fronta - Fe2O3
item.description: Μinimal evolving soundscapes and melodies accompanied usually with rhythmic noise, break beats and great industrial dance mechanics.

item.title: Access To Arasaka - Oppidan
item.description: Slow-tempo, dubstly bass, beautiful melodies and atmospheres, strange mechanics with fast-paced industrial cuts, designed carefully and delivered strong

item.title: The Black Dog - Music For Real Airports
item.description: An ambient album with compositions strong with emotion sometimes positive and sometimes dark. Rhythm and beat accompany many arrangements and each track has a certain place in the wholeness of this concept album

item.title: Ocoeur - Light As A Feather
item.description: Compositions that crosses techno, electro-acoustic, down-tempo and impose the IDM veil over the album also manage to deviate from it.

item.title: Soul Oddity - Tone Capsule
item.description: Experimental electro - techno from the deep 90s ( apparently). We have rhythmic challenges with analogue and monotone (mostly) bubbles and bleeps creatively mixing together.

item.title: Ab Ovo - Mouvements
item.description: Soundscapes and power (a little soft) rhythms, medolic-utted sequences with a down-tempo (ish) feel

item.title: Mnemonic - Monokultur
item.description: melodic keyboard dominate most tracks' structure and hard and complex beats build impressive rhythms. a dark, heavy yet emotional sound

item.title: Ginormous - the sound of love impermanent
item.description: an ambient mainly album covering modern classical and "idm" aspects that becomes lively enough to slightly bend the field of electronica

item.title: Frank Riggio - Noise Thinking EP
item.description: Breakbeat rhythm alongside creative use of samples. "Noise thinking" gets into a dark and aggressive theme all the way out

item.title: Beefcake - Drei
item.description: Ill, trip hop, break, experimental idm and orchestral stuff forging of beautiful compositions
